entry.title: SamarthKulkarni20/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
entry.content: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.

entry.content: üßà ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. entry.title: Nikhilkumarseeda/user-crud-server: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

entry.title: flufy3d/JianpuRender: A lightweight TypeScript library that renders Jianpu (numbered notation) from MusicXML or JSON to SVG/CANVAS. Features dynamic layout, interactivity, and real-time updates for web music apps.

entry.title: PedroFake02/better-link: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.
